Package com.harmonia.backend.controller

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
com.harmonia.backend.controller.UserController
@RestController @RequestMapping("user") public class UserController extends Object
Rest controller for handling user-related HTTP requests.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Harmonia team

  • Method Details

    • listUsers

      @GetMapping @CrossOrigin public Iterable<UserResponse> listUsers()
      Get a list of all users or a list of users by username if a username is provided
      Returns:
      an iterable list of UserResponse objects

    • listUsersByUserName

      @GetMapping("username/{username}") @CrossOrigin public Iterable<UserResponse> listUsersByUserName(@PathVariable("username") String userName)
      Get a list of users by username
      Parameters:
      userName - the username to search for
      Returns:
      an iterable list of UserResponse objects

    • findUserById

      @GetMapping("userId/{userId}") @CrossOrigin public UserResponse findUserById(@PathVariable Long userId)
      Get a user by their user ID
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user to retrieve
      Returns:
      a UserResponse object

    • createUser

      @PostMapping public UserResponse createUser(@RequestBody CreateUserRequest user)
      Create a new user
      Parameters:
      user - the CreateUserRequest object containing the user data
      Returns:
      a UserResponse object

    • loginUser

      @PostMapping("login") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserResponse> loginUser(@RequestBody CredentialsPO credentials)
      Authenticate a user by their username and password
      Parameters:
      credentials - a Map containing the username and password of the user
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with a UserResponse object if the user is authenticated, or a not found response if not

    • deleteUser

      @DeleteMapping("userId/{userId}") @CrossOrigin public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> deleteUser(@PathVariable Long userId)
      Delete a user by their user ID
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user to delete
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with a status of OK

    • editUsersByUserId

      @PutMapping("userId/{userId}") @CrossOrigin public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserResponse> editUsersByUserId(@PathVariable Long userId, @RequestBody User user)
      Edit a user by their user ID
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user to edit
      user - the User object containing the updated user data
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with a UserResponse object and a status of OK

    • changePassword

      @PutMapping("userId/{userId}/password") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserResponse> changePassword(@PathVariable Long userId, @RequestBody ChangePasswordRequest changePasswordRequest)
      Changes the password of the user identified by userId
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user to change the password for
      changePasswordRequest - the new password to set for the user
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with a UserResponse and HTTP status OK if the password was changed successfully, or HTTP status NOT_FOUND if the user is not found
